title: Elon Lied
author: VD
content_html:
Speaking of Twitter, I can now offer conclusive proof that free speech will NOT be permitted on Twitter and previously suspended accounts will NOT be restored. I tested Twitter myself with my @voxday account, suspended in 2017 for reasons that were never specified, and received this email today.

DISCUSS ON SG
